meanings.definition: A chemical group containing a carbonyl group attached to an amino group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the carbamoyls in the compound.
meanings.sent2: Carbamoyls are important building blocks in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The carbamoyls in the mixture decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared like carbamoyls in a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the carbamoyls made the experiment fascinating.

meanings.definition: The plural form of carbamoyl, a chemical group containing a carbonyl group attached to an amino group.
meanings.sent1: The lab contained various carbamoyls for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often work with different types of carbamoyls.
meanings.sent3: The carbamoyls on the shelf looked like a colorful collection.
meanings.sent4: The diversity of carbamoyls in nature is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The student marveled at the beauty of the carbamoyls under the microscope.
